ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your "Access Token" or "Personal Access Token" which can be found on your Square Application Dashboard [https://connect.squareup.com/apps/]. You can process payments by POSTing to the /chargeForCookie path with your payment nonce as the value on the nonce key for a JSON body

API_BASE_PATH.description: For sandbox testing use "https://connect.squareupsandbox.com", for production use "https://connect.squareup.com".
